questions.question_text: Reclamation rules can be applied to what types of software? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CDEFG
As per SAM book in the SAM course on pages 367-371
C - purchase rights
D - remove unallocated installs
E - remove unlicensed installs
F - create allocations
G - remove allocations
Correction I agree with Stepherbun it's CDEFG

The answers are A and D

from page 287 in the serviceNow sam book that came with the course.

choices.E: Information provided by the publisher pack
choices.A: Information provided in the demo data
choices.D: Information provided by the software library

questions.question_text: What type of publisher lifecycle information does the Software Lifecycle report prioritize?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B - information entered by the user

(as per page 436 in the SAM book from the SAM course.)

Selected Answer: B
Since Orlando, the Software Lifecycle report is enhanced to prioritize any publisher life-cycle information entered by the user over life cycle information provided by the software library.
